title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - MSFS FA 18C Legacy Hornet  - version 1.0
description:
In this video we will have a look at the FA 18C hornet which has been released as a free download on flightsim.to. The aircraft has been developed by DC Designs & CJ Simulations based on the original Hornet which was part of FSX. Don't expect it to be the quality of a paid add-on but it is a good starting point to be developed further by the community. First we will look at how to install it and after that will have a look how it looks both in the cockpit but also outside. Once we completed that step we will take it out for a short flight.

If you want to give the fighter a try visit the link below to download it
https://flightsim.to/file/48739/msfs-f-a-18c-legacy-hornet
